header.label: Our Story
header.title: About Exquisitebnb
header.subtitle: More than a place to stayâan experience crafted with intention, care, and a genuine love for hospitality.

story.title: Why We Created
paragraphs: Exquisitebnb was born from a simple belief: every guest deserves to feel truly welcomed, comfortable, and cared for. Not just a clean room and a key, but an experience that feels like coming home to something even better than home.

We've stayed in countless rentalsâsome forgettable, some uncomfortable, and a rare few that made us think, "This is how it should always be." Those exceptional stays inspired us to create something different.

Each of our properties is thoughtfully designed with intention. We obsess over the details: the softness of the linens, the quality of the lighting, the freshness of the space. We believe that great hospitality isn't about grand gesturesâit's about consistency, cleanliness, and care.

values.title: Thoughtful Design
values.description: Every space tells a story. We curate each property with beautiful furnishings, ambient lighting, and refined details that create an atmosphere of calm elegance.

values.title: Uncompromising Cleanliness
values.description: Hotel-level cleanliness isn't optionalâit's our standard. Rigorous protocols ensure every surface sparkles, every linen is fresh, every corner is pristine.

values.title: Genuine Care
values.description: Behind every stay is a real host who cares. We're responsive, attentive, and genuinely invested in making your experience exceptional.

values.title: Guest-First Approach
values.description: Your comfort drives every decision. From premium amenities to seamless check-in, we anticipate your needs before you even ask.

closing.title: A Personal Touch,
closing.text: When you book with Exquisitebnb, you're not just renting a spaceâyou're experiencing hospitality the way it was meant to be. Personal, warm, and consistently excellent. We look forward to welcoming you.

Floor-to-ceiling windows frame stunning city views, while designer furnishings and curated artwork create an atmosphere of refined comfort. Every detail has been thoughtfully considered, from the premium bedding to the fully-equipped chef's kitchen.

header.label: Questions Answered
header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: Everything you need to know about staying with Exquisitebnb. Can't find your answer? Feel free to reach outâwe're happy to help.

items.question: How do I book a stay?
items.answer: Booking is easy! Browse our properties, choose your favorite, and click 'Check Availability' to see dates. Then, complete your booking securely through one of our trusted partner platforms: Airbnb, VRBO, or Booking.com. Each platform handles reservations, payments, and provides their own protection policies.

items.question: Which platforms do you use for bookings?
items.answer: We list our properties on Airbnb, VRBO, and Booking.com. These trusted platforms handle all reservations, payments, and provide guest protection. You can choose whichever platform you preferâavailability and pricing are synced across all three.

items.question: How is cleanliness handled?
items.answer: Cleanliness is our top priority. Every property undergoes thorough professional cleaning between guests using hotel-level protocols. Fresh linens, sanitized surfaces, and careful attention to every detail ensure you arrive to a sparkling, welcoming space. We also provide premium toiletries and supplies.

items.question: What is the check-in and check-out process?
items.answer: We offer seamless self check-in with detailed instructions sent before your arrival. Most properties feature smart locks or secure lockboxes for easy access at any hour. Check-in is typically 3 PM and check-out is 11 AM, though we're happy to accommodate early arrivals or late departures when possible.

items.question: What amenities are included?
items.answer: All properties include high-speed WiFi, premium linens and towels, fully-equipped kitchens, quality toiletries, coffee and tea, and streaming services. Many also offer parking, air conditioning, washer/dryer, and workspace setups. Specific amenities vary by property and are detailed on each listing.

items.question: What is the cancellation policy?
items.answer: Cancellation policies are set on each booking platform (Airbnb, VRBO, Booking.com) and may vary slightly by property. Generally, we offer flexible or moderate cancellation terms. Full details are always visible before you confirm your booking on the respective platform.

items.question: How can I reach the host during my stay?
items.answer: We're always just a message away! You can reach us through the booking platform's messaging system, and we aim to respond within 30 minutes during daytime hours. For urgent matters, we provide a direct phone number after booking. We genuinely want to ensure you have everything you need.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Pet policies vary by property. Some of our spaces are pet-friendly (with a small pet fee), while others are pet-free to accommodate guests with allergies. Check the specific property listing for pet policy details, and feel free to reach out with any questions.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Many of our properties include free parkingâthis is noted on each listing. For properties without dedicated parking, we provide detailed information about nearby parking options, including street parking and local garages.

items.question: Can I host events or gatherings?
items.answer: Some of our larger properties can accommodate small, quiet gatherings with prior approval. However, parties and events are generally not permitted to ensure the comfort of neighbors and the integrity of the space. Please reach out to discuss your specific needs.

contactCta.text: Still have questions? We're here to help.

hero.label: Partnership Opportunities
hero.title: Elevate Your Property. Partner With Purpose.
hero.subtitle: We don't manage properties â we curate experiences. If you own a remarkable space and value thoughtful hospitality, let's explore what we can build together.

whyPartner.label: A Different Approach
whyPartner.title: Why Partner With Exquisitebnb
whyPartner.text: Exquisitebnb is built on a brand-first philosophy. We believe that exceptional stays are created through intention â not volume. Our partnerships are selective because quality cannot be scaled without care.

cards.title: Trust Over Transactions
cards.description: We prioritize relationships built on mutual respect and shared values, not quick turnovers or aggressive marketing tactics.

cards.title: Long-Term Value
cards.description: Our focus is sustainable success â protecting your asset's reputation while building a legacy of memorable guest experiences.

items.title: Curated Positioning
items.description: Each property is positioned as a distinct experience, not a commodity listing.

items.title: Design & Presentation
items.description: We guide styling, photography, and presentation to reflect refined taste.

items.title: Guest Quality Over Volume

items.title: Thoughtful Operations
items.description: Every detail â from communication to turnover â reflects our standard of care.

idealPartners.label: Ideal Partners
idealPartners.title: Who This Partnership Is For
items: Property owners with quality homes seeking premium positioning
Investors who understand that brand value protects asset value
Design-conscious owners who care deeply about guest experience
Hospitality-minded professionals who appreciate operational excellence

noteFull.label: A Gentle Note
noteFull.title: This May Not Be the Right Fit If...
noteFull.text1: Our approach is intentional, which means it's not for everyone. If your primary focus is maximizing nightly rates at any cost, or if guest experience feels secondary to revenue optimization, we may not be aligned.
noteFull.text2: We work best with partners who see their property as more than an investment â but as a space that deserves care.

process.label: How It Works
process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: We believe great partnerships begin with conversation, not contracts.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We start with a thoughtful conversation to understand your property, your goals, and your vision for the guest experience.

steps.title: Alignment & Preparation
steps.description: If we're a good fit, we work together on positioning, presentation, and operational details before going live.

steps.title: Launch & Collaboration
steps.description: Your property joins our collection, and we maintain an ongoing dialogue to ensure continued excellence.

cta.title: Let's Explore What's Possible
